多人行进。

冘字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yín］
［《廣韻》餘針切，平侵，以。］
行进。
[②]［yóu］
［《廣韻》以周切，平尤，以。］
见“冘2疑”、“冘2豫”。

冘字的康熙字典解释

【子集下】【冖字部】　冘； 康熙笔画：4； 页码：页130第14
【唐韻】餘針切【集韻】【韻會】夷針切，?音淫。【說文】淫淫，行貌。【前漢·揚雄傳】窮冘閼與。【註】孟康曰：冘，行也。又【唐韻】以周切【集韻】【韻會】夷周切【正韻】于求切，?音由。【前漢·馬援傳】冘豫未決。【後漢·來歙傳】冘豫不決。【註】狐疑也。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset 2] [冖字部]　冘; Kangxi strokes: 4; Page number: page 130-14
[Tang Yun] Yu needle cutting [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Yi needle cutting,? The sound is lewd. [Said the text] Fornication, behavior. [Previous Han·Yang Xiong Biography] Poor and poor. [Note] Meng Kang said: 冘, yes. And [Tang Yun] uses Zhou Qi [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Yi Zhou Qi [Zheng Yun] to seek cutting,? Sound origin. [Previous Han·Ma Yuan Biography] Undecided. [Laishan Biography of Later Han] Undecided. [Note] Suspicious too.
